fw.name: CDMAInteroperability

class.name: CATIPDMUEPrePostProcessSave
class.abstract: Interface to enable the user to forbid the save of certain documents and to know which documents have been saved in VPM.

method.name: PostProcess
method.abstract: Allows the user to know which documents have been saved in VPM.

method.name: PreProcess
method.abstract: Allows the user to forbid the save of certain documents.

class.name: CATIPDMUESave
class.abstract: Interface to enable some user specific check operations on the files.

method.name: OnSave
method.abstract: Allows the user to perform some operations on the file to save.

class.name: CATIVPMAccess
class.abstract: CATIVPMAccess allows to retrieve data from a ENOVIAvpm V4 database.

method.name: ExtractLFToFile
method.abstract: Extracts a long field from the ENOVIAvpm V4 database to a file.

method.name: ExtractLFToMemory
method.abstract: Extracts a long field from the ENOVIAvpm V4 database and opens it in memory .

method.name: ReadDone
method.abstract: Post-treatment once the document associated to the long field has been read.
